snippet: The three Fifth Avenue apartments owned by Huguette Clark, the reclusive copper heiress who died last year, are now being listed.
abstract: Three co-op apartments at 907 Fifth Avenue, part of the estate of the late copper heiress Huguette Clark, have been listed by Brown Harris Stevens; each of the meticulously maintained residences offers about 5,000 square feet and are listed at !2 million, $19 million and $24 million.
lead_paragraph: The three Fifth Avenue apartments owned by Huguette Clark, the reclusive copper heiress who died last year, are now being listed.

headline.seo: Listings for Fifth Avenue Apartments Owned by Huguette Clark
headline.main: Selling the Hideaways of a Reclusive Heiress
headline.print_headline: Selling the Hideaways of a Reclusive Heiress
